config.sneaktweak.speedPercentage.descri:
The speed of the smooth sneak animation.
100% is the default speed.
Values above 200% will make the animation bounce a little.
config.sneaktweak.sneakingEyeHeightPrese:
The eye height when the player is sneaking.

Default: The default height
Pre 1.14: The height used before Minecraft 1.14
Pre 1.9: The height used before Minecraft 1.9
Custom: The custom height specified in the setting below
config.sneaktweak.modifyThirdPersonSneak: Modify sneaking eye height in third person view
